name: Crème de mûre
description: Crème de Mûre is a sweet liqueur made from blackberries. It features a deep purple color and a rich, fruity flavor that combines sweetness with the natural tartness of blackberries. Crème de Mûre is commonly used as an ingredient in cocktails, adding a vibrant berry character to mixed drinks. It can also be enjoyed on its own or used to enhance the flavor of desserts and other culinary creations.
